Original:
馬特酒吧是我在台灣最喜歡的酒吧之一，
自從我到達以來，我嘗試了很多酒吧，但馬特酒吧是一流的，
氣氛和氛圍都很棒，
卡拉OK真是太棒了我們可以選擇英語甚至菲律賓語歌曲，
但是這個酒吧最亮點的是副經理/調酒師GARY，每次我們去的時候他總是陪伴我們並照顧我們，他的專業精神和細心受到高度讚賞，他照顧客人的方式是我們總是這麼做的原因之一回來吧，他是酒吧最好的資產..
我們來這家酒吧四次了，他的服務的一致性令人驚嘆。
Matt 酒吧真的強烈推薦給任何想要享受和喝酒，當然也想唱卡拉 OK 的人。
謝謝馬特·巴爾，也謝謝加里為我們提供的優質服務。
我們一定會一次又一次地訪問..🙏
EN:
Matt bar is one of my favorite bars in Taiwan,
Since I arrived, I have tried a lot of bars, but the Matt bar is first -class.
The atmosphere and atmosphere are great,
Karaoke is so great. We can choose English or even Philippine songs,
But the most bright thing about this bar is the deputy manager/bartender Gary. Every time we go, he always accompanies us and takes care of us. His professionalism and carefulness are highly appreciated. One of the reasons for doing, he is the best asset of the bar ..
We have come to this bar four times, and the consistency of his service is amazing.
The Matt bar really highly recommends anyone who wants to enjoy and drink, and of course want to sing karaoke.
Thank you Matt Balt, and thank you Gary with high -quality services.
We will definitely visit again and again .. 我们
